channel.title: PI client run help
channel.description:
Hello, I just downloaded this scource. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,485659.0/all.html
And the client runners in there won't work for me.
this is my compiler
[code] @echo off Title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit [/code]

item.title: PI client run help
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

I Vain I:

^ That’s a compiler, not a run command ^

He posted his compiler code…
Anyways, here is a run

@echo off Title Client START java -Xmx512m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit

Read full topic

item.title: PI client run help
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Post this in client help section.

Read full topic

item.title: PI client run help
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end pause exit

Read full topic

item.title: PI client run help
item.dc:creator: @jman7 jman7
item.description:
@jman7 wrote:

Hello, I just downloaded this scource. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,485659.0/all.html

And the client runners in there won’t work for me.

this is my compiler

@echo off
Title Client
cd ./Class/
"C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
exit

Read full topic
